title.rendered: Mercury Towers by Zaha Hadid Wins International Awards

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Every year, thousands of websites are submitted for consideration and only the top few are selected. Over the past four years, we’ve been recognized 14 times by multiple well-renowned web design & development award platforms, across multiple categories for our work, including Site of the Day, Best UI Design, Best UX Design, Best Innovation and many more awards.

We’re honored to have taken home 4 four international web design awards for our work with Mercury Towers by Zaha Hadid Architects.

Awwwards

  • Awarded for: Honourable Mention 

CSS Design Awards

  • Awarded for: Best in UI, Best in UX, Best in Innovation
  • Awarded for: Special Kudos

“It’s a privilege to be recognized by both Awwwards and CSS Design Awards for the work we did for Mercury Towers by Zaha Hadid Architects,” said Sam Urpani, Bison Studio Co-Founder. “Each year, our team works extremely hard to set new standards on the web and it’s a privilege to see our work alongside the absolute best in the industry.”

Read more about our work done for Mercury Towers by Zaha Hadid Architects: 

  • Mercury Towers Website
  • Mercury Towers – Interactive Sales Room
  • Mercury Towers – Sales Campaign

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Bison Studio wins 4 major international awards for the work done on Mercury Towers by Zaha Hadid Architects.
